page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE...
page.content: THE REV. HELEN JOHNSTONE M.A.,B.D. "I SPEND THE MORNINGS IN THE MANSE WRITING LETTERS AND REPORTS,FILLING IN FORMS,PREPARING FOR MEETINGS AND PREPARING FOR SERVICES.ONE MORNING A WEEK IS SPENT VISITING 1 OF THE 4 PRIMARY SCHOOLS IN MY PARISH,AND OCCASIONALLY I HAVE A MORNING MEETING IN DUNDEE. MOST AFTERNOONS ARE SPENT VISITING PARISHIONERS IN THEIR HOMES OR IN HOSPITAL.I TRY TO VISIT FAMILIES WITH NEW BABIES, PEOPLE PLANNING MARRIAGE,THE SICK,THE ELDERLY OR THE BEREAVED. ABOUT ONCE A MONTH I HAVE TO ATTEND CHURCH MEETINGS IN EDINBURGH. KIRK SESSIONS,CONGREGATIONAL BOARD, WOMEN'S GUILD AND PRESBYTERIAL MEETINGS TAKE PLACE IN THE EVENINGS."
